pr_title: DHFPROD-6283: Replacing fn.error calls with 400/404 errors

timeline.bodyText: @srinathgit  I fixed this test by the following change. I am guessing that the assertion on size == 1 was simply to make sure that the next assertion didn't fail because of a null pointer error. Based on my change to use httpUtils, there are now two steps under "trace" instead of just one. I have no idea why, but the following assertion still passes.
timeline.author: rjrudin
